/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
